item.title: Using the Library Virtual Desktop
item.description: A couple of months ago the Screen Sharing connection to the iMac in my campus office stopped working, presumably because ITS no longer allowed that connection. No matter, rather than working to get that restored I thought I’d dry using a Virtual Desktop connection to a Windows VM. I also had some need to work with Windows in other capacities so this seemed like a nice dual-purpose solution. It worked! Now I’m trying to remember and document how it works.
